review: Really cool and handy device . Can recommend.

review: EXTREMELY difficult to configure on PC, Kindle Fire and iPhone. Lots of hoops to jump through, and still doesn't work as advertised. Don't waste your money or time.
author: Michael J Locke

review: I love it.... we use ours all the time. Easy to set up and a fantastic alternative to being trapped by just cable and TV... Love Google!!!!
author: Billy Carmen "Billy"

review: If you have a smart phone or a laptop and a TV... you should own this product.It's awesome for groups casting youtube playlists, or chillin' out and watching netflix. If only Amazon wasn't trying to make it's own solution and allowed amazon prime to be chrome casted easily. There are workarounds for that, though.
author: Corwin VanHook

review: Dont waste your money, horrible to set up, wont connect to any internet
